https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uithBaujgR8hGivsfd4toSXWvpP.jpg A hyper-hipster 1980s horror comedy about a group of teenagers that discover a mysterious abandoned building where bad things happen. Shot in Wisconsin for $6000, Blood Junkie is a refreshing new vision in DIY independent film making. Blood Junkie
